title.value: Research into two-disc ploughshare with zero angle of slope of discs and truncated-cone ledges-furrow-maker
Исследования двухдискового сошника с нулевым углом атаки дисков и усеченно-конусными ребордами-бороздообразователями

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Petrovets, V.R., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents data about field test of one-disc serial ploughshares and experimental one for sowing grain crops. The main attention was given to the analysis of technological schemes of furrow formation by different two-disc ploughshares, and to the distribution of seeds in the depth by one-disc ploughshares of soil-cultivating-and-sowing aggregate and experimental two-disc ones depending on the speed, as all these indicators influence not only productivity of drills and reduction of the terms of sowing, but also productivity of cultivated crops.
